title: Can someone from Riot please explain this to me...
body:
So I recently transferred my account back to NA. The first gone I queue for I get a leavers 20min queue. Now keep in mind, when I transferred my account was in good standing. I am mad of course, since I am a busy person (work 50+hrs a week, father of 2 toddlers) I don't get a lot of game time. But whatever... I suck it up. It took me like a week to play the 20min queues games. And now because of the stupid new UI (and I'll be honest I also had music playing too, not too loud but anyways) I was setting up my masteries while on the pick and ban and guess what... It was my damn turn to ban (I am like 90% sure it was a banning turn and not my pick turn) , but since the timer, now with the new UI is so damn quiet, I failed to ban a champion... So now I am stuck with a 30 minutes queue... Like if 20 wasn't enough for me. I gotta be honest if this whole timer sound thing is not fixed I have to say I was happier with the old UI. This new one is gorgeous but is inconvenient af.

  But I digress, what I REALLY want to know is if a GM or someone can look at my past matches and confirm if the punishment is required. It seems excessive from my point of view, I know I did drop an ARAM game due to my internet going out and this latest fail to ban a champion but that's it. I honestly don't have the time to wait 30+ minutes in queue for a game, I really dont. If I did i'd probably just suck it up even if I didn't like the punishment, but like I said, If you look at my matches I barely am able to play the game that I love. I really hope someone from RIOT sees this and chimes in even if it doesn't resolve my issue. You've probably heard this and many other stories before and I am sorry if I waste anyone's time, but I really needed to vent. Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and I do see a trend of disconnections within the last month, which would explain why you're getting hit so frequently by those low-priority queues. I can understand wanting to go back to the Legacy Client, as there is still some work to be done to the Beta Client before it's ready to completely replace the Legacy Client. If you'd prefer to give that a go, you can access it anytime from the login screen, as shown below in this screenshot:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

While I cannot modify or remove your queue timers, as we're locked out of making such changes to uphold the integrity of the game; please let me know if you have any questions.
